QuoteText: From argument to bank notes, this is perhaps the most complete dodge I have ever seen
ResponseText: we're finished, freedom. arguing with you is like arguing with the floor. and no, this does not mean you won.

Depends on how you define 'win', nothing I asserted was refuted if that qualifies as 'won'; but no real attempt was made either. It's like someone saying "the sky is blue" and then claiming he won an argument when no one contradicted his statement. I can promise you that anyone reasonably proficient in logic could review this thread and have some serious criticisms on what you think is an argument. I invite any of you (one at a time of course) who believe I have said something incorrect that has been refuted on this thread to a formal debate where I take the resolution that I did not. You can't imagine how sure I am that would someone you disagreed with behave as you are now you would attribute it to their inability to think logically or ignorance.. for I have seen it. When it became clear fartigle could not support anything he said to you, he resorted to name calling; various informal fallacies and eventually quit. Did you 'beat' his arguments? How do you know you weren't a floor?

ResponseText: With you there is no such thing as a " Formal" debate. Good luck in your Debate with Sir Bennedict.. If he decided to take you up on it I'm buying popcorn and front row seats. That should be better than a one sided Football game.....

C'mon, Freedom. I've had you on "ignore" for months, but I get the gist of it. It's obvious that here you've been reduced to nothing but a source of condescendinging amusement. Am I right, or am I right? The horse you're flogging is beyond dead, it's friggin decayed. Hey, it's the nature of the beast, forums like this. Look at Easyrider, who's become the religious joke everyone--quite rightly, too--heaps scorn upon . You bucking for his spot... the religious loon every one takes potshots at? Didn't think so. If you really, sincerely, truly believe what you've been posting here, go to a moderated site like EvC Forum , and show us all up by engaging THEM in a "formal" debate." They'll be more than happy to oblige you. And after you've displayed your mettle with the big boys, you can come back here with a plethora of triumphant links under your arm and make us eat our atheistic, rational humanistic words, whereby we'll all bow down to the superiority of your fallacious, irrational "arguments."

QuoteText: Anyone remember what Sword Arthur used to do the chopping?
ResponseText: I can't remember, what was it called?

QuoteText: I can't remember, what was it called?

ResponseText: The Norman versions call it Excalibur, the Welsh versions call it Caledfwlch. Obviously the Celtic pronunciation is as difficult for the Anglicised people as my own surname. Mr. Pendrigh
